reviewText: The video quality is top notch. There is not much instruction but the routine is broken into sections and repeated many times in a row so following along is quite easy. It is a great pleasure to see Master Chen Xiaoxing in action and have him be the instructor for the video. I wouldn't exactly recommend this to a begginer, but for intermediate and advanced students who have a firm grasp on Chen Taiji fundamentals, this video is an excellent resource.
